verbs.description: [ARG0: Some] [V: see] [ARG1: Mark S. Inch ’s departure] [ARG2: as an opening for the Trump administration to endorse sentencing reform — one of the few issues that offer the possibility of a bipartisan deal] .

Some see Mark S. Inch ’s departure as an opening for [ARG0: the Trump administration] to [V: endorse] [ARG1: sentencing reform — one of the few issues that offer the possibility of a bipartisan deal] .

Some see Mark S. Inch ’s departure as an opening for the Trump administration to endorse sentencing reform — one of [ARG0: the few issues] [R-ARG0: that] [V: offer] [ARG1: the possibility of a bipartisan deal] .
